title: LabelGeometryMeasures
description: This tool computes various geometry measures on a label image, optionally using an intensity image, and outputs the results to a CSV file.

image_dimension.title: Image Dimension
image_dimension.description: The dimensionality of the input images (e.g., 2 for 2D, 3 for 3D).

label_image.title: Label Image
label_image.description: The label image on which geometry measures are computed.

intensity_image.title: Intensity Image
intensity_image.description: An optional intensity image for computing intensity-weighted measures. Use "none" or "na" if not provided.

csv_file.title: CSV File
csv_file.description: The output file where the geometry measures are written in CSV format.
